channel.title: Spring Break Regiment
channel.description:
Starting my every-day extreme workout regiment tomorrow for the entirety of Spring Break.
-waking up early, around 6 -eating a substancial meal, most likely a slim fast so i have starter calories to burn, then once those are burned, my body'll tap into the fat reserves and burn them off. -working out for 2 and a 1/2 hours, working every muscle group -jogging home after working out, house is almost two miles from gym -eating healthy -lots of water -push-ups and crunches before bed
And I'm only starting tomorrow cause I was just eating some cookie dough while watching 300 :D. I weigh around 170, a little more or less, idk. But I hope to lose a few pounds by the 7th of April.

A regiment is a military unit, composed of a variable number of battalions - commanded by a colonel.

item.title: Spring Break Regiment
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

Starting my every-day extreme workout regiment tomorrow for the entirety of Spring Break.

-waking up early, around 6
-eating a substancial meal, most likely a slim fast so i have starter calories to burn, then once those are burned, my body’ll tap into the fat reserves and burn them off.
-working out for 2 and a 1/2 hours, working every muscle group
-jogging home after working out, house is almost two miles from gym
-eating healthy
-lots of water
-push-ups and crunches before bed

And I’m only starting tomorrow cause I was just eating some cookie dough while watching 300 :D. I weigh around 170, a little more or less, idk. But I hope to lose a few pounds by the 7th of April.
